Tucson gives Talon a heartfelt kiss and then gives a playful expression of =
thought.  Perhaps two individuals could fit in one chamber if that chamber =
were large enough.  As far as he knew, the last chamber he was in was large=
 enough to accommodate another mech, provided that his guest was not too la=
rge.  In his case, Talon was just right.  He turns his head over to Stanton=
 and Quickstride with a gentile expression on his face.

" Thanks for the a=
ssist, I have Talon with me now, I'll be all right."

Quickstride gathers h=
is leaders intentions and steps back.

" Oh I see, sure, just be careful th=
e rest of the way to CR.  And if you have any trouble, call us.   Well, Sta=
nton, I think this is the part where we step back and allow our newest coup=
le to have a little bit of alone time.  Rodimus and Nightlight aren't the o=
nly ones who, you know..  Um yeah, I guess this means we could be seeing an=
 increase in members in the near future."

Straight Shot catches up to Quic=
kstride.

" C'mon, let's go back, they need time ta themselves."

Sure enou=
gh, Tucson escorts Talon into the CR chamber and feels his way to the large=
st one, which he had used previously for his last session.  This time would=
 be more than just therapeutic.  With a feel of his hand over the control p=
anel, he types in several codes that would allow for repairs and the presen=
ce of another individual at the same time.  

" I know you took quite a bit=
 of damage yourself.  I programmed the chamber to repair us both simultaneo=
usly .  And that could take a while which will give us plenty of quality ti=
me alone."

As his chamber opens, Tucson gently seats Talon down first and =
takes a seat next to her in a position where he could lay back and not harm=
 her in the process.  With a gentile coaxing he lays both Talon and himself=
 down on the comfortable repair bench.  There was just one minor formality.=
  He had never invited a femme bot to partake in formal courtship, and had =
no idea what it would entail.  With a playful look of bewilderment, Tucson =
gives a light chuckle.

" I just realized something.  I have no idea what I=
'm doing.  I've never engaged   in active courtship in my life.  You're the=
 first and only love I will ever have.  I may make a few mistakes so please=
 let me know if I do."

The door to the chamber closes and soon they are to=
gether, alone at last.


Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Tucson gives Talon a heartfelt kiss an=
d then gives a playful expression of thought.  Perhaps two individuals=
 could fit in one chamber if that chamber were large enough.  As far a=
s he knew, the last chamber he was in was large enough to accommodate anoth=
er mech, provided that his guest was not too large.  In his case, Talo=
n was just right.  He turns his head over to Stanton and Quickstride w=
ith a gentile expression on his face.</div><div><br></div><div>" Thanks for=
 the assist, I have Talon with me now, I'll be all right."</div><div><br></=
div><div>Quickstride gathers his leaders intentions and steps back.</div><d=
iv><br></div><div>" Oh I see, sure, just be careful the rest of the way to =
CR.  And if you have any trouble, call us.   Well, Stanton, I thi=
nk this is the part where we step back and allow our newest couple to have =
a little bit of alone time.  Rodimus and Nightlight aren't the only on=
es who, you know..  Um yeah, I guess this means we could be seeing an =
increase in members in the near future."</div><div><br></div><div>Straight =
Shot catches up to Quickstride.</div><div><br></div><div>" C'mon, let's go =
back, they need time ta themselves."</div><div><br></div><div>Sure enough, =
Tucson escorts Talon into the CR chamber and feels his way to the largest o=
ne, which he had used previously for his last session.  This time woul=
d be more than just therapeutic.  With a feel of his hand over the con=
trol panel, he types in several codes that would allow for repairs and the =
presence of another individual at the same time.  </div><div><br></div=
><div>" I know you took quite a bit of damage yourself.  I programmed =
the chamber to repair us both simultaneously .  And that could take a =
while which will give us plenty of quality time alone."</div><div><br></div=
><div>As his chamber opens, Tucson gently seats Talon down first and takes =
a seat next to her in a position where he could lay back and not harm her i=
n the process.  With a gentile coaxing he lays both Talon and himself =
down on the comfortable repair bench.  There was just one minor formal=
ity.  He had never invited a femme bot to partake in formal courtship,=
 and had no idea what it would entail.  With a playful look of bewilde=
rment, Tucson gives a light chuckle.</div><div><br></div><div>" I just real=
ized something.  I have no idea what I'm doing.  I've never engag=
ed   in active courtship in my life.  You're the first and only l=
ove I will ever have.  I may make a few mistakes so please let me know=
 if I do."</div><div><br></div><div>The door to the chamber closes and soon=
 they are together, alone at last.</div><div><br><br>Perpetually on the mov=

Tucson could sense Talon close to him and gives her a hear=
t felt smile and <br>
gently holds her hand.  The look on his face tells of=
 a priceless feeling of <br>
perpetual joy that could only be felt when in =
the company of those you love. <br>
He had found happiness the moment he me=

valuable than the most powerful weapo=
n in the universe.  What better way to <br>
express one's love and the joy =
it brings by giving something back that is as <br>
precious as love itself.=
  He was ready to take the next step.  As Rodimus <br>
graced Nightlight by=

holds her hand.<br=

spark.  A family is formed when the love of two sparks come t=
ogether as one. <br>
And as you have given me so much of your heart, I woul=
d like to give you so <br>
much more of mine.  That of course, is if you wa=
nt me to.  I promise not to <br>
do anything unless you conscent to it firs=
t."<br>
